Speaker: Alex
Text: I think I found your music...

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: Actually it is sort of in the way...

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: It is very moving but I am having trouble moving past it...

Next.Speaker: Henry
Next.Text: I guess the emotional intensity can get a bit much, when you've had enough you don't need to carry on listening...

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: I am really having difficulty leaving this wonderful music behind.

Next.Speaker: Henry
Next.Text: My dear boy!  Feel free to turn it down in the options menu...
